title: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of sync (1GILQD5)
description: When exporting a directory (project) and placing the exported jar in the same directory (project), an out of sync message is displayed when overwriting the exported jar file the second time.
OB: When exporting a directory (project) and placing the exported jar in the same directory (project), an out of sync message is displayed when overwriting the exported jar file the second time.
EB: The exported jar file should not trigger an out of sync message when overwritten in the same directory (project).
SR:
1. Open a directory (project) in the software.
2. Export the directory as a jar file.
3. Place the exported jar file in the same directory (project).
4. Attempt to overwrite the exported jar file.
5. Note that an out of sync message is displayed.
